alert.note: Alert for Northern Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 8:24PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Echols, central Ware, central Clinch and western Charlton Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 824 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northwest of Stephen Foster State Park to 9 miles north of Needmore. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fargo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for southeastern Georgia.
